actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the United States should establish direct diplomatic relations with the Governments of the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic and the Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the United States establish diplomatic relations with Ukranian Soviet Socialist Republic and the Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the United States should establish direct diplomatic relations with the Governments of the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic and the Byelorussian Soviet Socialist Republic.
